title: Publish owner-provided Xocial.Stream FAQ copy verbatim

requirements.summary: Replace the existing FAQ page heading and accordion content with the owner-provided “Xocial.Stream — FAQ” copy rendered verbatim, preserving order and paragraph breaks.
acceptanceCriteria: The FAQ page H1 heading renders exactly: “Xocial.Stream — FAQ”

The FAQ accordion contains exactly these questions in this order, with answers displayed exactly as provided by the owner (no added/removed/rewritten text):
1) What is Xocial.Stream?
2) How is this different from YouTube or other platforms?
3) How does Xocial.Stream work?
4) Are my uploaded videos safe? Will I lose them if something crashes?
5) Can other people see my videos?
6) Do you compress my videos?
7) Are there upload limits?
8) What video formats can I upload?
9) What content is allowed on Xocial.Stream?
10) What if my video gets blocked?
11) How do I share my videos?
12) Can I delete my videos?
13) Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
14) Is there a mobile app?
15) What is the Internet Computer (ICP)?

All paragraph breaks and the upload-limits plan list (Free Plan / Pro / Creator Plus) appear as separate lines/paragraphs matching the provided text (no extra bullets, numbering, or formatting changes that alter the text)
No other FAQ content remains from the current FAQPage.tsx implementation

file_operations.description: Replace the current heading and all existing FAQ items with the owner-provided final “Xocial.Stream — FAQ” content from msg-1, ensuring the H1 is exactly “Xocial.Stream — FAQ” and the accordion questions match the required 15-question order. Use the existing shadcn-ui Accordion components (Accordion/AccordionItem/AccordionTrigger/AccordionContent) to present the FAQ; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Render answers in a way that preserves owner-provided punctuation, capitalization, and paragraph breaks exactly (e.g., literal text with preserved newlines), and remove any old questions/answers from the current file.

requirements.summary: Add an in-file single-source-of-truth constant for the FAQ copy and render exclusively from it without transforming the literal characters.
acceptanceCriteria: FAQ content is defined once (single constant) and rendered from that constant without re-typing the copy across multiple JSX fragments
No transformation logic (e.g., auto-trimming, auto-capitalization, markdown conversion) changes the literal displayed characters of the provided FAQ text

file_operations.description: Introduce a single immutable in-file constant (e.g., a frozen/readonly array of { question, answer } entries, plus the exact heading text) containing the owner-provided FAQ copy verbatim, including all intended line breaks for paragraphs and the upload-limits plan list. Update rendering to map over this constant so the copy is not duplicated across JSX and is displayed without any text transformation (no trimming, reflow, markdown parsing, or reformatting).
